amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws regulating the licensing, construction, and operation of nuclear reactors, and nuclear waste disposal.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of two amendments, offered en bloc and printed in the Congressional Record on January 19, 1994 as amendments Nos. 73 and 153, exempt from the provisions of the bill any legislation regulating licensing, construction, and operation of nuclear reactors, and nuclear waste disposal.

action.text: On agreeing to the Green amendments (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 259 (Roll no. 26).
